physDesc.p: Fragments 1-16 (in mm), (1) 20 x 49, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 57 x 37, (A) 8 lines, left bottom margin, (B) blank, (3) 55 x 18, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, top margins, (4) 54 x 18, (A) 9 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (5) 46 x 25, (A) 6 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (6) 39 x 23, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (7) 19 x 27, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 23 x 32, (A) 1 line, left margin (?), (B) blank, (9) 23 x 38, (A) 3 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (10) 36 x 28, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (11) 18 x 18, 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 73 x 54, (A) 5 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (13) 103 x 22, (A) 11 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (14) 57 x 38, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 8 lines, no margins, (15) 54 x 32, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (16) 92 x 34, (A) 11 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 6 lines
